messages.title: A note before you send off your postal vote
messages.content: With a snap election giving so little time for preparation, I have agreed to stand again as your parliamentary candidate, and I need to mount a full challenge to the wave of attacks that our NHS, our schools, our environment and our people on low incomes are facing at the moment.

messages.title: I believe we need an MP who will make a difference
messages.content: Whether helping an individual with a problem, working to get the best deal for local workers and businesses, supporting voluntary organisations or arguing the case with ministers for local causes. I did this for 13 years. If you give me the opportunity, I will do so again.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Encouraged by national Labour policies ensuring we will have hospitals with NHS staff and full operations and access to a GP.
Merging health and social care will give disabled people and older people joined-up services, reducing hospital stays and helping people stay at home.

issues.brexitEurope: To keep the integrity of the UK and the international relations - so the UK can begin to build the rest of the 21st century as a trading platform again.
issues.economy: Working to get the best deal for local workers and businesses.
issues.education: We will help restore the pay, make exams make better sense and bring back respect for the people who teach.
issues.environment: To protect our natural environment, working with local community groups.
issues.governance: I have agreed to stand again as your parliamentary candidate.
issues.health: Encouraged by national Labour policies ensuring we will have hospitals with NHS staff and full operations and access to a GP.

housing.content: To increase affordable housing to rent and to buy, including appropriate homes in our villages - the right homes for first time buyers and down-sizers.

politicalExperience.achievements: Supporting voluntary organisations, arguing the case with ministers for local causes.

images.caption: David Drew: Honest, Hardworking, A champion for local people.
